name: StandardizedPainAssessmentTool
title: Standardized Pain Assessment Tool
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent pain assessment tools or instruments used to quantify pain intensity.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with pain assessment tools or instruments used to quantify pain intensity such as 0-10 numerical rating scale, visual analog scale, a categorical scale, pictorial scale, faces pain rating scale, or the Brief Pain Inventory (BPI).),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Pain severity Wong-Baker FACES pain rating scale
Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported
